com.facebook.buck.core.graph.transformation

Interface AsyncTransformationEngine<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAsyncTransformationEngine

    public interface AsyncTransformationEngine<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>
    Transformation engine that transforms supplied ComputeKey into ComputeResult via AsyncTransformer. This engine is able to asynchronously run graph based computation, reusing results when possible. Note that the computation graph must be an acyclic graph.

    This engine is able to deal with dependencies in the computation graph by having Transformer request dependent results of other transformations through TransformationEnvironment.evaluate(Object, Function).

    Implementations should have all methods of this class as tail recursive and non-blocking when working together with TransformationEnvironment and AsyncTransformer.

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,CompletableFuture<ComputeResult>> computeAll(Iterable<ComputeKey> keys)
        Asynchronously computes the result for multiple keys
        Parameters:
        keys - iterable of keys to compute on the graph
        Returns:
